page.title: 12LAMBEG/CASTLEROBIN RELIGION
page.content: The area is well served with{churches and{chapels}some of which have been established for many years, and some which have been built to cater for the growing suburban population in the east of the "D-block".The older churches include{Derriaghy Parish (C of I) and the small{chapel}off the Barnsfield Rd.(RC). Newer churches include{St.Columba's (CofI),Belsize Rd.;{Harmony Hill {Presbyterian; St.Colman's(RC),}Lambeg and The{Mission Hall,}Milltown. {Twinbrook}estate is served by several chapels which lie outside our "D-block. {**SEE NOTE** {
